text: today we'll be discussing the last piece
of media Sponge Bob rehydrated
the SpongeBob SquarePants franchise has
a lot of lost media ranging from
official segments to unofficial
mockumentaries and it's not really
surprising as to why the show's
characters are household names so it's
only logical that a number of its
derivatives end up on the cutting room
floor the last time I discussed this
franchise was when I covered the story a
day with SpongeBob SquarePants a bootleg
whose backstory was much more convoluted
than it seemed unlike a day with
SpongeBob however this project seemed to
be produced officially by Nickelodeon
our story begins in January of 2016 with
an anonymous post from for Chan's comic
and cartoons board titled oh boy another
lost spongebob thing it was ashore in to
the point post the poster believed that
in 2003 Nickelodeon and aired and
non-canon spongebob short that was a
parody of the most recent matrix
installments their evidence for this was
a resurface bumper that featured short
clips of Spongebob dressed up as the
franchise's main character the bumper
they referenced contain less than five
seconds of the relevant footage and only
resurfaced two days prior because the
post caption was simply speculation this
search would begin with even less
information than a date with SpongeBob
this didn't gain much traction receiving
only eight replies before being archived
fortunately one of these replies seemed
to provide a promising lead 20 minutes
after the thread had been created an
anonymous poster commented that they had
once owned a copy of the short on VHS
they then asserted some additional
details about the film the a non claimed
that the short ran for ten minutes and
that on his VHS it aired before Jimmy
Neutron they also claimed that the short
had been titled the sponge tricks though
they provided no verification of any of
these claims in spite of the
informations questionable credibility
later that day an article about the
sponge tricks was added to the lost
media Wikia although it was very poorly
written the first draft of the article
was only 61 words long including the
link most of the information about the
short was unverifiable in fact the only
thing that it had gone
for it was that it had been featured in
an official Nickelodeon bumper without
that stipulation though the rest of the
search would have been much more
difficult but even still the available
footage raised a lot more questions than
it answered like why was the short
animated in 3d those who believed in the
second for chanters assertions
speculated that this oddity could have
been related to it airing before Jimmy
Neutron
after all Jimmy Neutron was also
animated in 3d and was done so on an
extremely tight budget perhaps their
methods could have been applied during
the production of the sponge trucks on
January 30th the Wikia user by the name
of angry 750 501 speculated that the
sponge tricks could have been part of a
fan-made Newgrounds animation that
shared the same name this animation had
been uploaded in 2004 which was
approximately the same timeframe as the
bumper but upon further analysis the
theory was quickly dismissed firstly it
doesn't make sense for Nickelodeon to
use some random fans animation a year
before it was even released but more
importantly the new ground sponge tricks
was animated in 2d not 3d and as for the
name it was probably a pure coincidence
just a year prior the film The Matrix
Reloaded had premiered making it very
topical in 2004 as mentioned before the
initial 4chan thread didn't receive much
attention but even though the search
didn't pick up there it did continue on
other online communities on March 8th a
thread about the tape was started on the
lost media wiki discussion subform the
threads creator expressed hope that it
would lead to the same level of
dedication as the search for a day with
Sponge Bob this thread would become the
search efforts home base the first thing
on the agenda was to discuss the
legitimacy of the sponge tricks claim in
case you hadn't figured it out by now
4chan is full of trolls and considering
the supposed tape owner provided no
proof that anything he said was true the
searchers were rightfully skeptical
after all up until this point the post
was essentially the extent of their
knowledge on the projects it was
important to determine whether or not it
was worth
seriously the four Campos claimed that
it was a short that aired before Jimmy
Neutron but if this was the case why
would they take up a 10-minute time slot
with little to no fanfare Sponge Bob is
their biggest IP and ten minutes of
animation is quite an investment one
proposed that it could have aired before
the Jimmy Neutron film with that
timeline didn't line up either the film
had premiered in 2001 finally it was
pointed out that the CGI didn't compare
to Jimmy neutrons while Jimmy Neutron
had a lot of errors it never looked as
bad as this 3d spongebob video although
they were desperate for information The
Searchers wisely discarded the four
champ post as a troll so they began to
investigate leads independently since
they knew that this was an officially
associate product they began contacting
animators that worked for or at
Nickelodeon in 2003 on April 29th their
efforts paid off it was discovered that
an additional 30 seconds of footage from
the sponge Trix existed on an ex Nick
digital animators 2013 portfolio the new
footage showed the same spongebob model
from the bumper fighting an army of
Patrick clones all dressed up as Agent
Smith the footage unlike the commercial
was of an extremely high quality though
it's audio had been dubbed over with the
portfolios music as you may remember the
original 4chan post referred to the
short as the sponge tricks while this
rumor was finally debunked with the
discovery of the animators portfolio
which referred to the footage as
spongebob rehydrated this title was a
clear riff on Matrix Reloaded the video
had been uploaded to an account called
goopy rossi though it had been found out
that the animators real name was Randy
gozman
searchers from The Lost MediaWiki
swiftly attempted to contact the
uploader though he seemed to ignore all
their attempts they would message him on
very clearly active accounts only to
receive no response regarding the short
though they knew that more animation
existed the exact nature of the short
was still unknown so they began
researching Gossman x' connection to
nickelodeon they found from his
portfolio that he had worked
3d spongebob adventure games by THQ
which led to some speculation that the
footage was from an unused in-game
cutscene others desperate to hold on to
the four champ post in spite of it being
thoroughly debunked continued to hang on
to the idea that it was a full
television special and finally it was
even proposed that it could have simply
been what we've known already a bumper
and nothing more though if that were the
case it seemed a bit strange to give it
such an elaborate title cart with this
it seemed that the online community was
close to finally getting some answers
and new information was soon to follow
that would crack this case wide open
what were these new clues well we'll
find out after a quick word from our
sponsor do you want to know an easy way
to save money lower the interest rate on
your credit card debt with a credit card
consolidation loan from light stream you
see you white stream rewards consumers
who have good credit with a great
interest rate and no fees you can get a
credit card consolidation loan from five
point eight nine percent APR with Auto
pay loans are from five thousand dollars
to a hundred thousand and you can choose
your funding date as soon as today I've
checked them out myself and yes I can
attest that their interest rates are
very good and my listeners get an
additional interest rate discount on top
of light streams already low rates the
only way to get this discount however is
to go to light stream comm slash
mysteries that's light stream dot-com
slash mysteries subject to credit
approval rate includes 0.5% auto pay
discount terms and conditions apply and
offers are subject to change without
notice
visit light stream comm for more
information after weeks of continued
silence from Gossman searchers moved on
and attempted to contact other members
of the production team they were hopeful
that someone could provide them with
more insight in August one searcher used
Twitter to ask longtime crew member
Vincent Waller about the short he
replied that it had to have been
unofficial likely fan-made due to its
quality but this response didn't seem to
make sense as the bumper clearly proved
that it had been
at least in association with Nickelodeon
perhaps he was implying that the bumper
had been faked
but his response was largely ignored
it's been said although Vinson had been
on the team from the very beginning he
did very little in 2003 another searcher
attempted to contact a creator of
chowder who once worked on the spongebob
production team as a storyboard artist
and writer they received an interesting
response back he said I don't remember
that short but it might have been
produced by different studio for
something other than TV this response
complicated things but it also explained
a few others if this were the case then
that meant that the searchers attempted
to contact ex members of Spongebob
production teams in vain explaining
Wohlers disregard but on the other hand
this would greatly widen the searches
rein for potential contacts making it
more difficult to find relevant sources
on September 5th the moderator for the
lost media wiki named Cobo chat posted
in a tapes forum thread detailing a lead
that he had attempted to follow to no
avail
when searching through the Twitter
archives he had found that in 2013 an
account named Soph says quack had
tweeted about how they just watched a
spongebob episode about the matrix oh my
freaking God this episode is a spongebob
version of the matrix just realised
weirdest episode of Spongebob I've ever
seen but it's hilarious
towba reached out to her with some
footage of rehydrated for reference
asking if this is what she saw she
responded I think it was but she never
responded to any further inquiries then
after that the lead ride up in fact the
whole search would slowly die after that
point with no significant progress being
made for months it had been largely
inactive when on April 5th 2017 a
youtuber Vail Ski BOM uploaded a video
about the shorts it was called mystery
of the lost spongebob shorts and as of
June of 2018 it accumulated nearly half
a million views it was just enough of an
attention boost to rejuvenate the
interest that the search needed viewers
began flooding the spongebob wiki and
spamming two contact emails of the
portfolio's
bloater this newfound attention would
finally incite Gossman to respond he was
sick of the constant email spam and was
upset with all the untrue rumors present
in the video so later that same day he
created an account named Gossman on the
Spongebob wikia and wrote a blog spot
clarifying exactly what Spongebob
rehydrated was he said earlier today I
received an email asking me to come here
and make this post I don't know who sent
the email or how they figured out who I
was but I would like to clear up these
untrue rumors about the spongebob matrix
short
according to Gossman the animation was
in fact made by the same team who had
worked on the THQ spongebob video games
hence the resemblance to its cutscenes
he also confirmed that it was made in
2003 but dispelled the idea that it was
ever a lost episode or a 10 minute short
as it turns out this whole time it was
just a forty second long clip according
to Gossman the crew had made it for fun
in their free time and it only saw
broadcasts because Nick decided it would
be fitting for a bumper hence why none
of the production crew knew about it the
next day Vale ski bum uploaded another
video about the project this time
attempting to correct the record and
discuss the revelations when Gossman had
written the blog spot he had hoped that
it would stop the constant flood of
emails
unfortunately the spam only worsened due
to the second video so in a last-ditch
effort to stop people from spamming him
he requested that the moderators delete
his post permanently after this the
portfolio that had contained the
additional rehydrated footage was
eventually set to private
technically spongebob rehydrated is
still a lost piece of media because we
never were able to find the original
audio clip that went with the short film
but after we found out the story about
the movie everybody kind of lost
interest that kind of happens sometimes
with lost media hunting though the end
result is not always the most exciting
thing ever and that should be expected
so I'll wrap up the video here and until
next time thanks for watching
[Music]
you
